name: agora-appbuilder-core
description: React Native template for RTE app builder

scripts.uikit: rm -rf template/agora-rn-uikit && git clone https://github.com/AgoraIO-Community/ReactNative-UIKit template/agora-rn-uikit && cd template/agora-rn-uikit && git checkout fix/geo_fencing_revert
scripts.dev-setup: npm run uikit && npm run deps && node devSetup.js
scripts.web-build: cd template && npm run web:build && cd .. && npm run copy-vercel
